newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungarian O/N rates end easier on ample liquidity.
newsitem.headline: Hungarian O/N rates end easier on ample liquidity.

text.p: Hungarian overnight rates gave a quarter of a point by the end of session compared to their opening rates amid ample liquidity on the market, dealers said.
The overnight rates finished at 20.50 percent, compared to 20.75 percent at opening and 20.625/20.875 percent at Wednesday's close.
Dealers said trading volumes were small and overall activity was modest.
They added they did not expect substantial changes on Friday as no tax payments were due this week.
